alert.note: Alert for Jones (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 6:03AM EDT until further notice by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Newport/Morehead City NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Trent River At Trenton affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Trent River At Trenton. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Water inundates Trent Street and Landfill Road. Significant flooding of Trenton Community Park is also expected. Musselshell Creek backs up and threatens Highway 41 north of town. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:20 AM EDT Monday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:20 AM EDT Monday was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The Trent River is Forecast to Crest Later Today. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued this evening by 900 PM EDT.
